title: The Clinic
creator_credit: The Film House, Generation Films, Robert Le Tet, Bob Weis and David Stevens
brief_description: Take an innocent intern on his first day at a VD clinic, add in a bunch of doctors and nurses who have seen it all before then mix it all up with the craziest and funniest patients you’ll ever meet. That’s the recipe for this highly infectious comedy. Stars Chris Haywood and Simon Burke.
creator_credit_for_label: The Film House, Generation Films, Robert Le Tet, Bob Weis and David Stevens
